argumentText:
ARGUMENT
f k w

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isclm.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | isclm.k | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 3 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Scalar ` w ) e. _V |
| 4 | 3 | #P_a1i | |- ( w = W -> ( Scalar ` w ) e. _V ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` f ) e. _V |
| 6 | 5 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( w = W /\ f = ( Scalar ` w ) ) -> ( Base ` f ) e. _V ) |
| 7 |  | #P_id | |- ( f = ( Scalar ` w ) -> f = ( Scalar ` w ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( w = W -> ( Scalar ` w ) = ( Scalar ` W ) ) |
| 9 | 8, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( w = W -> ( Scalar ` w ) = F ) |
| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_sylan9eqr | |- ( ( w = W /\ f = ( Scalar ` w ) ) -> f = F ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( w = W /\ f = ( Scalar ` w ) ) /\ k = ( Base ` f ) ) -> f = F ) |
| 12 |  | #P_id | |- ( k = ( Base ` f ) -> k = ( Base ` f ) ) |
| 13 | 10 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( w = W /\ f = ( Scalar ` w ) ) -> ( Base ` f ) = ( Base ` F ) ) |
| 14 | 13, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( ( w = W /\ f = ( Scalar ` w ) ) -> ( Base ` f ) = K ) |
| 15 | 12, 14 | #P_sylan9eqr | |- ( ( ( w = W /\ f = ( Scalar ` w ) ) /\ k = ( Base ` f ) ) -> k = K ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( ( w = W /\ f = ( Scalar ` w ) ) /\ k = ( Base ` f ) ) -> ( CCfld |`s k ) = ( CCfld |`s K ) ) |
| 17 | 11, 16 | #P_eqeq12d | |- ( ( ( w = W /\ f = ( Scalar ` w ) ) /\ k = ( Base ` f ) ) -> ( f = ( CCfld |`s k ) <-> F = ( CCfld |`s K ) ) ) |
| 18 | 15 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( ( ( w = W /\ f = ( Scalar ` w ) ) /\ k = ( Base ` f ) ) -> ( k e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) <-> K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) ) |
| 19 | 17, 18 | #P_anbi12d | |- ( ( ( w = W /\ f = ( Scalar ` w ) ) /\ k = ( Base ` f ) ) -> ( ( f = ( CCfld |`s k ) /\ k e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) <-> ( F = ( CCfld |`s K ) /\ K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) ) ) |
| 20 | 6, 19 | #P_sbcied | |- ( ( w = W /\ f = ( Scalar ` w ) ) -> ( [. ( Base ` f ) / k ]. ( f = ( CCfld |`s k ) /\ k e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) <-> ( F = ( CCfld |`s K ) /\ K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) ) ) |
| 21 | 4, 20 | #P_sbcied | |- ( w = W -> ( [. ( Scalar ` w ) / f ]. [. ( Base ` f ) / k ]. ( f = ( CCfld |`s k ) /\ k e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) <-> ( F = ( CCfld |`s K ) /\ K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) ) ) |
| 22 |  | #P_df-clm | |- CMod = { w e. LMod | [. ( Scalar ` w ) / f ]. [. ( Base ` f ) / k ]. ( f = ( CCfld |`s k ) /\ k e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) } |
| 23 | 21, 22 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( W e. CMod <-> ( W e. LMod /\ ( F = ( CCfld |`s K ) /\ K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) ) ) |
| 24 |  | #P_3anass | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ F = ( CCfld |`s K ) /\ K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) <-> ( W e. LMod /\ ( F = ( CCfld |`s K ) /\ K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) ) ) |
| 25 | 23, 24 | #P_bitr4i | |- ( W e. CMod <-> ( W e. LMod /\ F = ( CCfld |`s K ) /\ K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) ) |
